description: NBC gives Alexa all the information she needs to connect you with your favorite NBC shows. Want to know what happened on a recent episode? When can you watch it live? Alexa knows the answers so youâ€™ll always be up to date.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask NBC what's on tonight?

name: NBC
shortDescription: NBC lets you connect to your favorite NBC shows with the power of your voice. Find out what's on and get all the show information you're looking for.
